Player History
Hit for the cycle against Cincinnati on 5/1/1968...
Traded from Los Angeles to New York (A) on 6/15/1968 (Going to LA: SS T. Kubek, P B. Stafford, P T. Metcalf, P J. Bouton, 1B J. Mayberry Sr.. Going to NYY: LF C. Yastrzemski, P B. Kelso, P M. La
chemann)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1969, hitting .474 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1969 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1969, hitting .351 with 6 HR, 23 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1969, hitting .529 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Traded from New York (A) to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1970 (Going to CHC: 3B T. Conigliaro, LF C. Yastrzemski, P T. Wilshusen. Going to NYY: C J. Ferguson, 2B D. Lopes, 1B J. Young, P E. Stephenson)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1970, hitting .524 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Detroit on 1/31/1973 (Going to CHC: P F. Martinez, 3B L. Parrish. Going to DET: P D. Hughes, LF C. Yastrzemski)...
Traded from Detroit to Baltimore on 5/28/1973 (Going to DET: P D. Rau. Going to BAL: LF C. Yastrzemski, RF C. Summers)...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/30/1973, off Jim Roland (MIN)...
